description: Number of inequivalent Hadamard designs of order 4n.
comments: In other words, number of 2-(4*n-1,2*n-1,n-1) symmetric designs.
references: Spence, Edward; Classification of Hadamard matrices of order 24 and 28. Discrete Math. 140 (1995), no. 1-3, 185-243.
links: R. K. Guy, Letters to N. J. A. Sloane, June-August 1968
Index entries for sequences related to Hadamard matrices
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
